page.title: 12Interview-Thetford farmer.
page.content: This farmer lives on Thetford Farm.Square 1115 on the map.He rents 530 acres of land.In the last 20 years his men have gone down from 12 to 3,but now he has 8 tractors and uses chemicals.He has a lot of machinery.He is a mixed arable farmer which means that he grows crops.He grows potatoes,wheat,barley sugar beet and also daffodils.As well he has about 60 bullocks a year to fatten up for beef.On his land there are 3 spinneys.He thinks the land is good because it is flat,the soil is easy to work on and there is not much rain.His biggest problem is in the summer when there is not enough rain.In his leisure time he plays golf.
